cDNA Change.ref: N-terminal missense mutations within the UBL domain
cDNA Change.alt: missense mutations in the UBL domain

Protein Change.ref: N-terminal missense mutations within the UBL domain
Protein Change.alt: missense mutations in the UBL domain
Protein Change.position: Four specific mutations identified: c.216G>A (p.G80A), c.349T>C (p.T117C), c.509G>A (p.G169D), and c.512G>T (p.G171D)

variants.Description in input context: Four N-terminal missense mutations, located within the ubiquitin-like domain (UBL), decrease the stability of parkin; as a consequence, these mutants are rapidly degraded by the proteasome.
